definition: to share tribulations/to help sb with worries and difficulties
part/share/ingredient/component

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: I take your part when the darkness comes. And pain is all around.
sentences.chinese: 當黑暗來臨，苦難遍地，我會爲你分憂解勞。

sentences.english: Good politician solves the problems of the people.
sentences.chinese: 好的政客上臺後與民分憂。

sentences.english: I would have shared more of the responsibility carried by my husband.
May the depth of your faith and the love of those who share your loss sustain you.
sentences.chinese: 願你篤誠的信仰和爲你分憂的朋友們的愛心支撐你。

sentences.english: On weekdays in the busy and busy, for I through.
sentences.chinese: 平日忙裏又忙外，爲我分憂解心煩。

sentences.english: Friendships multiply joys, and divide grieves.
sentences.chinese: 友誼能夠添樂，也能夠分憂。

definition: delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
honorable even in defeat (idiom)
to die in battle (idiom)
readily following good advice (idiom); willing to accept other people's views
lit. to return to office after living as a hermit on Mount Dongshan (idiom); fig. to make a comeback
to be reluctant to give up a post
written polemics
to travel around the country
generous gifts
expedient
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
neighborly relations
old: to reap the consequences of one's words (idiom, from Mencius); modern: to go back on one's word/to blow hot and cold/to contradict oneself/inconsistent
to say goodbye/leave-taking/farewells
